author: jukka
msg: Updated frontpage including the latest news.

author: chirino
msg: Also exposed the memory limits and usage via JMX and allowed the limit to be configured via a destination policy.

author: jstrachan
msg: added a replay buffer to the ReliableTransport so that nodes with missing messages can re-request stuff

msg: DERBY-539 : apply Jeff Levitt's patch that adds more information to the

author: jstrachan
msg: cache around endpoints so that they are reused - so that networks using brokerIds & brokerInfos can store the state on the endpoint
